name: Suspicious Digital Signature Of AppX Package
description: Detects execution of AppX packages with known suspicious or malicious signature
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

detection.query: selection: {"EventID": 157, "subjectName": "CN=Foresee Consulting Inc., O=Foresee Consulting Inc., L=North York, S=Ontario, C=CA, SERIALNUMBER=1004913-1, OID.1.3.6.1.4.1.311.60.2.1.3=CA, OID.2.5.4.15=Private Organization"}
